title: Every Musician Funko Pop! Figure Worth Collecting: Shop BTS, Britney Spears & Guns N’ Roses
summary: Funko Pops! has immortalized everything from beloved artists to iconic album covers and music moments.
body: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, Billboard may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. It’s always the season for hunting for awe-worthy gifts your friends and family will be talking about for years to come. Funko has made it possible to bring artists and albums home through collectible figurines inspired by iconic bands, singers and even albums. If you’re searching for creative gifts for your loved ones , Funko Pop! makes everything from special stocking stuffers or unique gifts for music lovers that can be treasured and put on display year-round. Shop the Best Funko Pop! Figures, at a Glance: Best Rock Funko: Kiss The Demon (Rock and Roll All Night) – $14.99 Best KPop Funko: BTS – Jung Kook – $10 (was $13) Best Hip Hop Funko: TLC ‘Oooooooohhh… On the TLC Tip’ – $69.99 Best Pop Funko: Britney Spears (Oops! I Did It Again) – $14.99 Best Reggaeton Funko: Rosalía ‘Motomami’ – $25 Your first thought may be to surprise the music fan in your life with tic…

title: Start Your Next Vacation With a Food Tour
summary: A couple talk with their local tour guide while looking at dragonfruit and other fresh tropical fruits for sale at a farmer’s market. While planning a trip to Peru earlier this year, my travel partner and I went big. We booked everything from paragliding to a chocolate-making class. It was an excit…
